title: Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• Design and develop robust mobile applications delivering high-availability and performance.
  • Understanding of the agile development life-cycle.
  • Diagnose performance issues, fix bugs including crashes to increase the functionality of the application.
  • Write well designed, testable, efficient code.
  • Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications.
  • Prepare and produce releases of software components.
  • Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review.
  • Collaborate with team members, product managers, developers, designers to brainstorm about new features and functionalities.

Desired Candidate Profile

  • Total work: 3 years (Preferred).
  • Graduate in Computer Science/ Computer Engineering/ related field.
  • Mobile applications: 2 years (Required).
  • Flutter Framework / Ionic Framework Preferred.
  • Strong familiarity with Web Server technologies including Node.js, NGINX, IIS, and Apache Web Server.
  • Knowledge in RDBMS (MySQL, MSSQL, PostgreSQL) systems and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB.
  • HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Angular: 1 year (Required).
  • Familiarity using version control tools like Git, Subversion etc. and IDEs like Android Studio, VS Code etc.
  • Knowledge of Dart programming language, Rest APIs and integration of various APIs from third parties.

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Meeting with the design team to discuss the requirements of the client.
  • Building and configuring Magento 1x and 2x.
  • Coding of the Magento templates.
  • Developing Custom Magento modules using best practices.
  • Setting performance tasks and goals.
  • Troubleshooting integration issues.
  • Updating website features and security patches.

Skills Required

  • Strong 2+ Years Experience on Working on Magento 1x and 2x.
  • Must have Magento Core Knowledge (Enterprise or Community Edition).
  • Hands on experience on customization of Magento Themes, Magento Modules Development, Extension Development.
  • Must have Strong knowledge in MySQL.
  • Strong Hands-on experience working on PHP 5 and above.
  • Worked on CLI tool Git , and basic Linux commands.
  • Experience with Magento APIs customization and integration (REST / GraphQL / SOAP).
  • Should be well versed with Cloud resources.
  • Experience establishing CI/CD process and other DevOps best practices.

title: Mobile Application Developer/Flutter Developer
tagsAndSkills: Mobile Development,Flutter,Dart,Mobile application development,Flutter Development,Development,Mobile applications,Application
jobDescription:
Please find the job description below :

Job Brief:
At Exaze, we constantly seek exciting talent to join an organization that believes in nurturing dreamers, innovators, and doers willing to expand their horizons in the software industry. 
To be successful in this role, the candidate should have excellent communication skills and be able to understand requirements and ask questions to clarify them. The candidate should be able to work independently and as part of a team and be committed to delivering high-quality results. 
Candidature Requirements:
• The candidate should be able to work independently and as part of a team and be committed to delivering high-quality results.
• An Engineering graduate or Postgraduate from a recognized College / University.
• Good aptitude, logical reasoning, and analytical thinking skills.
• Good written and verbal communication skills.
• Inclination to learn and grow.
• Attention to detail.
• Ability to work in cross-functional teams using agile methodologies.
• Problem-solving skills.
• A values-driven individual who can think abstractly and can take ownership.

Areas of responsibility:
Senior Flutter developers must have a competent understanding of the following:
• The system development life cycle.
• The defined system development tools, processes, and workflows.
• The distinction between business, functional, and non-functional requirements and how to implement them.
• The importance of delivering high-quality source code and how to achieve it.
• The technologies used and the systems components structure.
• The domain and business terminologies and link them back to system implementations.

Must-have requirements:
Flutter developers should be able to demonstrate that they can:
• Develop, test, and maintain the deployed application software with high quality.
• Collaborate with product managers and designers to ensure a high-quality product and excellent user experience.
• Analyse, maintain and enhance existing applications and troubleshoot issues with efficiency.
• Perform accurate development estimation.
• Produce technical specifications and designs. Participate in new business development through ideation, prototype development, and project estimates.
• Research new techniques, tools, and best practices and share that knowledge with the team and community.
• Maintain high standards.
• Analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Self-starter who takes ownership, is accountable, and can work under minimum supervision.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Can help with quality assurance and provide comments.
• 6+ years' experience as an iOS/Android developer.
• 3+ years experience as a Flutter developer.
• Experience with software development in a test-driven environment.
• Excellent understanding and application of design principles.

Tools:
• SoapUI (SOAP) / REST client (JSON), Xcode, Atlassian tool suite (Jira, Confluence).

Technologies:
• iOS/Android, Flutter, UML, XML, JSON, SOAP, and REST Web Service Development.

Nice to have requirements:
• 2+ years of user interface analyst experience (preferred).
• Software Engineering related degree/qualification.
• Honours degree.
• Business experience and product knowledge.
• Experience in Objective C is beneficial.
• Have worked on at least one app published in the App or Play Store.
• Experience with migration of native apps to Flutter.
• Experience with the development of Flutter plug-ins and modules.
• Experience with an app deployment pipeline.

Job- Location:
• Exaze Hyderabad.

Number of positions:
• 15

Thanks,
Payal

title: Mobile Application Developer ( Flutter )
tagsAndSkills: continuous integration,Version control,GIT,Mobile development,Agile scrum,Programming,Deployment,Mobile applications
jobDescription:
• We are seeking a skilled Mobile Application Developer to join our dynamic team
  • The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing high-quality mobile applications using the Flutter framework
  • As a Flutter Developer, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, maintain, and improve existing applications
  • The successful candidate will have a strong passion for mobile development, a solid understanding of Flutter, and the ability to translate technical requirements into user-friendly and visually appealing mobile applications

Preferred Skills:
  • Knowledge & Experience as a Flutter Developer or Mobile App Developer.
  • Proficiency in Dart programming language.
  • Experience with the Flutter framework and its ecosystem.
  • Experience with state management solutions in Flutter
  • Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git.
  • Experience with continuous integration and deployment processes.
  • Knowledge of mobile app security best practices.
  • Previous experience with Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
  • Proficient in Data Structure and Algorithms.

title: Mobile Application Developer (Android)
jobDescription:
• Design and build advanced functionalities for the Android platform.
  • Write test codes (especially Unit Tests and Integration Tests) to ensure robustness, improve usability and performance is in your hands.
  • Be part of the future of mobile apps for hearing aids and help create outstanding mobile offerings.
  • Take ownership of your developed modules and aim for a continuous improvement of those.
  • Work in your scrum team closely with system feature teams, the product teams and embedded software teams.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate and implement new technologies to maximize development and testing efficiency.
Education :
  • Completed university studies (master/ bachelors degree/ diploma) in Computer Science, Mathematics or a comparable subject.
  • Personality and Working Practice: agile, self-motivated, self-organized, team player with an open-source mind set, open to international collaboration.
Skills :
  • You have good problem-solving skills with the ability to navigate through complex situations
Experience :
  • Substantial years of experience as a Software Developer and some years of experience in developing high-quality Android apps with a strong agile mindset.
Knowledge :
  • In depth familiarity with Kotlin and Android SDK.
  • Experience with Bluetooth is also a plus, working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends and emerging technologies,
  • Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle Enthusiasm.
  • Shares our passion for writing clean, readable, and testable code We are also open to hire candidates on a hybrid arrangement
